title: Annoying Darius Bug that I'm sick of
body:
Not sure if it's just me that has noticed that when darius uses his apprehend on an enemy then immediately tries to follow up with w or an auto, for some weird reason if there is a minion nearby he will attack it instead of his target. This has happened to me countless times and has cost me my life on many occasions (yes one stack of bleed can make a huge difference). And no this is not me miss-clicking because it has happened far too often, so I would be grateful if Riot could take a look into this please.

http://imgur.com/8UEjTz3

http://i.imgur.com/8UEjTz3.gifv

(sorry gif doesn't seem to be working)

replies.body: Are you sure that you aren't using any form of attack move? Sometimes that registers on minion and I do that sometimes -_-

No as I said if you try to use w IMMEDIATELY after e it happens, otherwise I have to wait half a second and its annoying because that gives the enemy some time to react and I want to do the full combo as fast as possible
